sentences.en: All new fashion starts out as a reaction against existing convention.
sentences.cn: 所有新时尚都是从打破现有常规开始的。

sentences.en: Every council member voted against the proposal.
sentences.cn: 每位市政会委员都对该提案投了反对票。

sentences.en: Gambotti was injured in last Saturday’s game against the Lions.
sentences.cn: 甘博蒂在上周六与雄狮队的比赛中受了伤。

sentences.en: He advised me against travelling.
sentences.cn: 他建议我不要去旅行。

sentences.en: He slewed the car against the side of the building.
sentences.cn: 他的车滑到了大楼的一侧，抵住了。

sentences.en: He spent hours throwing a tennis ball against a wall.
sentences.cn: 他好几个小时都对着一堵墙掷网球。

sentences.en: I had a persecution complex and thought people were conspiring against me.
sentences.cn: 我有过被害情结，认为大家都在密谋暗算我。

sentences.en: I have nothing against you personally.
sentences.cn: 我对你个人没有不满。

sentences.en: In early trading in Tokyo, the dollar fell sharply against the yen.
sentences.cn: 在东京市场早市开盘时，美元对日元的比价急剧下跌。

sentences.en: Many manufacturers have policies to protect themselves against blackmailers.
sentences.cn: 许多厂家都购买了保险，以防遭到敲诈。

sentences.en: Mr Howard has declared that he is against all forms of racism.
sentences.cn: 霍华德先生表明反对任何形式的种族主义。

sentences.en: Owen was against it, on the grounds of expense.
sentences.cn: 欧文因费用问题对此表示反对。

sentences.en: sailing against the wind
sentences.cn: 逆风航行

sentences.en: She dived down and swam out strongly against the current.
sentences.cn: 她跳下水，逆流奋力游出去。

sentences.en: The case against is twofold: too risky and too expensive.
sentences.cn: 反对理由有两点：太冒险而且太昂贵。

sentences.en: The drop was caused partly by the pound's strength against the dollar.
sentences.cn: 下降的部分原因在于英镑对美元的升值。

sentences.en: the fight against terrorism
sentences.cn: 反恐怖主义的斗争

sentences.en: The Home Secretary is considering a new law against stalking.
sentences.cn: 内务大臣正考虑制定一项针对跟踪骚扰的新法律。

sentences.en: The war against drug peddling is all about cash.
sentences.cn: 禁毒斗争归根到底是钱的问题。

sentences.en: The younger policeman was leaning against the bureau with his arms folded.
sentences.cn: 那位较年轻的警官两臂交叉，倚靠在办公桌旁。

sentences.en: There was a heavy thudding noise against the bedroom door.
sentences.cn: 卧室门上发出一声沉重的撞击声。

sentences.en: There was a ladder propped up against the wall.
sentences.cn: 有一把梯子靠在墙边。

sentences.en: They were going to sail around the little island, against the tide.
sentences.cn: 他们打算绕着小岛逆潮航行。

sentences.en: This is something of a grudge match against a long-term enemy.
sentences.cn: 这可以说是一场与宿敌你死我活的比赛。

sentences.en: This was the most biting criticism made against her.
sentences.cn: 这是对她最尖锐的批评。

sentences.en: those who are campaigning against the new road
sentences.cn: 鼓动反对修筑新公路的人

sentences.en: violence against elderly people
sentences.cn: 对老年人的暴力行为

sentences.en: We’ll be competing against the best companies in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我们要和欧洲一些顶级的公司竞争。

sentences.en: You see, this is what we’re up against – the suppliers just aren’t reliable.
sentences.cn: 你瞧，这就是我们必须面对的难题，供应商就是靠不住。

phrases.tran_cn: 在…对面；正对着；与…相反；与…形成对照

trans.tran_cn: 反对，违背，针对，不利于，（法律或法规）禁止，防，和…对抗，碰，撞，靠着，逆向，以…为背景，与…相比
trans.tran_en: next to and touching an upright surface, especially for support
